system:
note description: "[ Objects that represent a tab associated with a notebook item. These objects may not be created directly but instead returned from a notebook via item_tab. If ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_widgetwidget is subsequently removed from ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_notebooknotebook, Current is automatically destroyed and is no longer usuable. ]" legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2009-06-03 17:11:49 -0700 (Wed, 03 Jun 2009) $" revision: "$Revision: 79073 $"
class ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xmlEV_NOTEBOOK_TAB
inherit ../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY redefine ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_implementationimplementation, ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state, ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed end
../interface/ev_textable.xmlEV_TEXTABLE redefine ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_implementationimplementation, ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state, ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed end
../interface/ev_pixmapable.xmlEV_PIXMAPABLE redefine ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_implementationimplementation, ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state, ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed end
../interface/ev_selectable.xmlEV_SELECTABLE redefine ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_implementationimplementation, ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state, ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed end
create {../implementation_interface/ev_notebook_i.xmlEV_NOTEBOOK_I} ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_make_with_widgetsmake_with_widgets
feature {../implementation_interface/ev_notebook_i.xmlEV_NOTEBOOK_I, ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xmlEV_NOTEBOOK_TAB} -- Initialization
f_make_with_widgets../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_make_with_widgetsmake_with_widgets (a_notebook: ../interface/ev_notebook.xmlEV_NOTEBOOK; a_widget: ../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET) -- Create Current with ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_notebooknotebook a_notebook and ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_widgetwidget a_widget. -- Not exported as you may only query a notebook tab from a notebook -- via item_tab. require notebook_not_void: a_notebook /= Void widget_not_void: a_widget /= Void notebook_has_widget: a_notebook.Falsehas (a_widget) do ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_notebook_tab_i.xml#f_set_widgetsset_widgets (a_notebook, a_widget) ensure notebook_set: ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_notebooknotebook = a_notebook widget_set: ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_widgetwidget = a_widget end
feature -- Access
f_notebook../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_notebooknotebook: detachable ../interface/ev_notebook.xmlEV_NOTEBOOK -- Notebook in which Current is displayed. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_notebook_tab_i.xml#f_notebooknotebook ensure result_not_void: Result /= Void end
f_widget../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_widgetwidget: detachable ../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET -- Widget to which Current is associated. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_notebook_tab_i.xml#f_widgetwidget ensure result_not_void: Result /= Void end
feature -- Status report
f_is_destroyed../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is Current no longer usable? do Result := ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed or else not (attached ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_notebooknotebook as l_notebook and then attached ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_widgetwidget as l_widget and then l_notebook.Falsehas (l_widget)) end
feature {NONE} -- Contract Support
f_is_in_default_state../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is Current in its default state? do Result := ../interface/ev_textable.xml#f_is_in_default_statePrecursor {../interface/ev_textable.xmlEV_TEXTABLE} and ../interface/ev_pixmapable.xml#f_is_in_default_statePrecursor {../interface/ev_pixmapable.xmlEV_PIXMAPABLE} end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_implementation../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_implementationimplementation: ../implementation_interface/ev_notebook_tab_i.xmlEV_NOTEBOOK_TAB_I -- Responsible for interaction with native graphics toolkit.
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_create_interface_objects../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_create_interface_objectscreate_interface_objects -- Create objects to be used by Current in ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_initializeinitialize -- Implemented by descendants to create attached objects -- in order to adhere to void-safety due to the implementation bridge pattern. do end
f_create_implementation../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_create_implementationcreate_implementation -- See {EV_ANY}.create_implementation. do create {../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xmlEV_NOTEBOOK_TAB_IMP} ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_makemake end
invariant notebook_not_void: ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_usableis_usable implies ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_notebooknotebook /= Void widget_not_void: ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_usableis_usable implies ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xml#f_widgetwidget /= Void

end -- class ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xmlEV_NOTEBOOK_TAB
